items.sentence: I thought that you were going to come straight home.
Why are we attracted to some people, but not others?
There's nothing about Tom that surprises us anymore.
Mary opened her shopping bag and pulled out a dress.
Tom didn't deny that he was the one who'd done that.
My pride prevented me from borrowing money from him.
I took a taxi so I'd be in time for the appointment.
Tom gives us something to eat whenever we visit him.
When I returned an hour later there was no one home.
If that's how it is, then there's no problem, right?
Tom didn't realize that Mary didn't want to do that.
I may have read that novel, but I don't remember it.
I returned to my hometown after five years' absence.
I like these clothes more than I like those clothes.
I went to bed after preparing everything in advance.
I found this book interesting from beginning to end.
I broke my leg in two places during a skiing mishap.
I was unable to attend the party, nor did I want to.
I don't like to take on such heavy responsibilities.
I've been working for this newspaper for four years.
